charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] saw Arezu
hanging out with Lilligant.
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1101_020:
As [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] approached them, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] noticed that
Arezu was talking to Lilligant.
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1201_030:
Such a nice day, isn’t it? We should kick
back and relax together.
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1201_040:
Oh! Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
You seem in high spirits today.
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1201_050:
I was just talking to Lilligant to get to know
her better.
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1201_060: I wanna understand Lilligant better this time.
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1201_070:
Especially after all the trouble I caused when
taking care of a different Lilligant in Hisui.
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_0401_090:
*chuckle*
Do you really wanna hear how I messed up?
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_0402_110:
Yup. There’s a special Lilligant that the Hisui
wardens take care of.
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1201_120:
In Hisui, there are Pokémon that were
blessed by almighty Sinnoh.
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1201_130:
Those special Pokémon are called
“the nobles.”
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1201_140:
As a warden, I was asked to take care of
the Lady of the Ridge, Lilligant.
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1201_150:
And there was a time when the Lady went
into a frenzy.
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1201_160:
I should’ve asked for help, but I pushed
myself too hard and tried to take care of it
on my own.
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1201_170:
I ended up causing a lot of trouble for many
people and Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1201_180:
That’s when I realized I not only lacked
strength and experience as a warden...
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1201_190:
but I also didn’t understand Lilligant enough
as a Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1201_200:
That’s why I’m so happy to have formed a
sync pair with Lilligant here on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1201_210:
I’ll learn more about her as we spend time
together!
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_0401_230: Thanks! I’m happy to hear you say that!
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_0302_240: I hope you become better friends!
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_0402_250: Yup! I wanna become her ultimate partner!
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1201_260:
I’m gonna gain all the experience I can here
on Pasio...
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1201_270:
and become a warden who understands
Lilligant better than anyone!
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1201_280:
If I stumble, I’ll use what I learn to handle
whatever comes next!
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1201_290:
And if I feel stuck, I’ll be sure to tell
someone!
charaepi_ch0312_00_hinatsu/2301_1201_300:
I’ll be coming to you for help, OK,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
